subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Denis Savard was fired as coach of the Chicago Blackhawks, only hours after the team’s first victory. He was replaced by Joel Quenneville, 50, who had been hired as a team scout in September after coaching the St. Louis Blues and Colorado Avalanche for most of the previous 11 seasons.
